Title: Edge DevTools for Visual Studio Code 1.4.0 – Improved Screencasting, Device Emulation and live, inline issue reporting
Description: The 1.4.0 release of the Microsoft Tools for Visual Studio Code brings a few highly requested features. We improved the screencasting feature, added device emulation and live issue reporting in your source code. You can check the 3 minute highlight reel here .
